attributes.action: Public Enquiry into Organised Child Grooming, Commercial Sexual Exploitation of Children and ALL Forms of Child Abuse in the UK/Channel Islands
attributes.additional_details: We the undersigned call for a full independent judicial Public Enquiry into organised Child Grooming, Commercial Sexual Exploitation of Children, Paedophilia, and ALL forms of Child Abuse in the UK and the Channel Islands, and the various responses to it by all Local Authorities, Social Services, relevant charities/NGO’s, Police, Crown Prosecution Services, Judges, Politicians and Government Ministers, Civil Servants and the Media, with a view to full public transparency and accountability and to make recommendations to ensure the travesty of child abuse within our institutions never happens again; further, we ask that, as a consequence of this Enquiry, that no one person or body should be immune from prosecution for Abusive Actions against Children, past or present; such Acts of Abuse to include any Deliberate Act to Prevent any Child Abuse from Becoming Apparent to the Authorities or the Greater Public, no matter when such acts were committed.
